T02D3056:108a-1: hya gr'i ba s'a dha nam n'a ma /
T02D3056:108a-3: rta mgrin gyi sgrub thabs zhes bya ba /
T02D3056:108a-5: rta mgrin gyi ni sgrub pa'i thabs //
T02D3056:108b-0: de nas yang dag @108b rab bshad bya /
T02D3056:108b-1: dang po re zhig sngags pas yid dang rjes su
T02D3056:108b-2: mthun pa'i gnas su bdud rtsi lngas byugs la ji
T02D3056:108b-3: ltar 'dod pa'i stan la nye bar 'dug ste /
T02D3056:108b-4: rang gi snying ga'i h'um yig las 'od zer 'phros
T02D3056:108b-5: pas bla ma dang sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems
T02D3056:108b-6: dpa' rnams la nye bar sbyod ba thams cad kyis
T02D3056:108b-7: yang dag par mchod pa dang /
T02D3056:108b-9: sdig pa bshags pa la sogs pa byas te /
T02D3056:108b-10: aom sva bh'a ba shuddha: sarba dharm'a: sv'a bh'a ba shuddhonyaham /
T02D3056:108b-11: aom sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra sva bh'a ba a'atma konyaham zhes yang dag par brjod do //
T02D3056:108b-12: 'di'i sngags kyis rang dang gzhan stong pa nyid du bsgom par bya'o ;
T02D3056:108b-13: / de nas bcom ldan 'das dkyil 'khor gyi dbus
T02D3056:108b-14: su padma 'dab ma bzhi pa'i lte ba'i steng du
T02D3056:108b-15: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi gdan la thod pa bdud
T02D3056:108b-16: rtsi dang bcas pa der bsam par bya'o //
T02D3056:108b-17: der h'um yig yongs su gyur pa las bsam par
T02D3056:108b-18: bya ba'i sangs rgyas ni drag po zhal bzhi pa
T02D3056:108b-19: zhabs bzhi pa ; g-yas pa'i zhabs brkyang ba /
T02D3056:108b-22: lha mo bzhis yongs su bskor ba /
T02D3056:108b-23: gang 'dod pa'i dngos grub kyi bdag nyid chen po rta mgrin ni /
T02D3056:108b-24: sku mdog dmar po mche ba rno ba gtsigs pa spyan gsum pa /
T02D3056:108b-25: rtsa ba'i dang g-yas dang g-yon gyi zhal ni dmar po dang //
T02D3056:108b-27: spyi bo'i rta'i zhal gyi rnam pa de'i kha dog ni shing pa l'a sha bzhin no //
T02D3056:108b-28: thod pa khrag dang sha chen pos gang ba sngags
T02D3056:108b-29: rnams kyi dbang bskur ba rab tu sbyin par bya'o
T02D3056:108b-30: // rta zhal la sogs pa'i dbu la rgyan thams cad rdzogs pa /
T02D3056:108b-31: mgo bo'i phreng bas brgyan pa'o //
T02D3056:108b-32: g-yas kyi phyag rnams kyis lcags kyu dang /
T02D3056:108b-35: g-yon pa rnams na zhags pa dang /
T02D3056:108b-39: 'dir sgrub pa pos de 'dra ba'i bcom ldan 'das su bsgom par bya'o //
T02D3056:108b-40: mchod pa'i bdag nyid bdud rtsi lngas yang dag par mchod par bya'o //
T02D3056:108b-41: mdun du bzhugs pa'i lha mo rdo rje rta ma
T02D3056:108b-42: 'jigs ma chen mo hr'i: yig las yang dag par
T02D3056:108b-44: phyag bzhi ma g-yon na gzhu dang thod pa bdud rtsi dang bcas pa'o //
T02D3056:108b-45: g-yas kyis mda' dang rtse gsum mo //
T02D3056:109a-1: sku yid du 'ong ba'i gzi brjid can /
T02D3056:109a-2: rgyab tu bzhugs pa'i lha mo zhal gcig phyag bzhi ma ham las yang dag par byung ba /
T02D3056:109a-3: g-yon na kha tv'am ga dang /
T02D3056:109a-5: g-yas na thod ba khrag gis gang ba dang /
T02D3056:109a-7: ka p'a la'i gdan gyi dbus na bzhugs pa sku
T02D3056:109a-8: mdog dmar mo 'bar ma chen mo mtshan ni phag
T02D3056:109a-9: mor brjod do // g-yas su ni rdo rje khros
T02D3056:109a-10: ma thod pa'i gdan la yang dag par bzhugs ma
T02D3056:109a-11: mor brjod do // / hr'i: las yang dag par
T02D3056:109a-12: byung ba'i lha mo sku mdog ser mo zhal gcig
T02D3056:109a-13: mor brjod do // / phyag bzhi ma / g-yon na dug gis gang ba'i thod pa dang /
T02D3056:109a-15: g-yas su da ma ru dang /
T02D3056:109a-17: g-yon du bzhugs pa'i lha mo kha dog dkar mo phyag na rdo rje can te /
T02D3056:109a-18: 'dab ma bzhi rnams la bzhugs pa'o //
T02D3056:109a-19: rta mgrin 'khor bcas la mchod par bya'o //
T02D3056:109a-20: lha mo thams cad kyi dug dang /
T02D3056:109a-21: dri chu dang bcas pas so //
T02D3056:109a-22: zhabs 'od kyi phreng ba la bzhugs shing mgo bos brgyan pa /
T02D3056:109a-23: spyan gsum pa mche pa rno ba gtsigs pa 'jigs par mdzad pa /
T02D3056:109a-24: gang 'dod pa'i dngos grub kyi bdag nyid can no //
T02D3056:109a-25: sngags kyi rgyal po rjes su dran na der 'di'i sngags ni /
T02D3056:109a-26: aom ha ya gr'i ba hr'i: aa ham aa ha aam aam h'um h'um sv'a h'a /
T02D3056:109a-28: rtag tu bzlas pa rjes su dran pas /
T02D3056:109a-29: 'bum phrag gnyis dang bye ba phrag gcig gis de nad med par 'gyur ro //
T02D3056:109a-30: gang yang sngar bsags pa'i sdig ba 'joms pa dang /
T02D3056:109a-31: dus thams cad du rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug gis bsrung bar 'gyur ro //
T02D3056:109a-32: 'di nyid kyi lha mo rta gdong ma ni brtan pa sa'i dngos po dang /
T02D3056:109a-33: byams pa 'phro ba'i sems dang me long lta bu'i rnal 'byor ro //
T02D3056:109a-34: g-yas g-yon gyi lha mo ni chu dang /
T02D3056:109a-35: snying rje dang mnyam nyid dang me dang dga' ba dang /
T02D3056:109a-36: so sor rtog pa'i rang bzhin no //
T02D3056:109a-37: lha mo glang gdong ma ni rlung gi dngos po
T02D3056:109a-38: dang btang snyoms kyi sems su dran zhing bya ba
T02D3056:109a-39: rjes su grub pa'i rnal 'byor ro //
T02D3056:109a-40: sna tshogs pa'i gzugs ni sna tshogs ba'i tshul du brjod do //
T02D3056:109a-41: kha dog sngon mo ni gnyis su med bar byed
T02D3056:109a-42: pa chos kyi sgra sgrogs ba bsdigs bar mdzad pa'o
T02D3056:109b-0: // kha dog ser mo ni @109b dri ma med par rtogs so //
T02D3056:109b-1: kha dog dmar mo ni chos rnams la chags pa'i sems kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'o //
T02D3056:109b-2: zhabs bzhi'i rnam dag ni 'phags pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi'o //
T02D3056:109b-3: rta'i gdong pa ni gzhan pa med pa'i sems kyi
T02D3056:109b-4: rang bzhin 'di chos kyi dbyings rnam bar dag pa
T02D3056:109b-5: dang ; lam rnam par dag par gzhol bar mngon par brjod do //
T02D3056:109b-6: rgyu'i de nyid gang la lta ba dang /
T02D3056:109b-7: 'bras bu'i de nyid kyi phyag rgya ni sangs rgyas
T02D3056:109b-8: bcom ldan 'das thar pa la spyan gsum gyis gzigs
T02D3056:109b-9: pa'o // thog ma med pa'i ye shes kyi sems dud 'gro'i zhal du bstan to //
T02D3056:109b-10: yid sbyong ba'i rnal 'byor pas ri ltar rtag tu gnas par bya'o //
T02D3056:109b-11: rgyud thams cad kyi snying po bla na med pa rta mgrin gyi sgrub thabs zhes bya ba /
T02D3056:109b-12: pandi ta pra bh'a ka ras mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02D3056:109b-14: // / rgya gar yul b'a r'a na s'i'i pandi ta
T02D3056:109b-15: pu ru shotta ma'i zhal snga nas legs bar mnyan
T02D3056:109b-16: te / lo ts'a ba sh'akya'i dge slong nyi ma
T02D3056:109b-17: rgyal mtshan dpal bzang pos bla ma dam pa'i bkas
